Circle - Class in <Unnamed>
The class Circle defines a shape with the characteristics of a circle.
Circle() - Constructor for class Circle
Zero argument constructor for objects of class Circle that sets colour to OUColour.BLUE, xPos and yPos to 0,.and diameter to 30,
Circle(int, OUColour) - Constructor for class Circle
Constructor for objects of class Circle with arguments for diameter and colour, and which sets xPos and yPos to 0.
